name: 1 Pic: What's the Beast?
description:
Welcome to the craziest zoo on the planet! We took unrelated animals and created mysterious new creatures: strange, unexpected and funny. Look at the photos and try to guess which animals or insects were used to create these new species! If you like word-guessing games like 4 Little Squares and Mosaic: Tap and Guess, this game is for you.

Key features:
• hundreds of pictures
• available in English, French, German, Spanish and Russian
• fun for the whole family

Challenge your brain, have fun and learn more about animals!
